Cluster 0.name: Forest and Dog Enthusiasts
Cluster 0.description: This cluster includes individuals who prefer spending time in the forest and have higher education. Most of them are men aged 45–54, and their favorite animals are dogs.

Cluster 1.name: Water-Side Professionals
Cluster 1.description: This cluster includes individuals with higher education who prefer spending time by the water. Most of them are men aged 35–44, and their favorite animals are dogs.

Cluster 2.name: Young Mountain Lovers
Cluster 2.description: This cluster includes younger individuals with secondary education who prefer spending time in the mountains. Most of them are men aged 25–34, and their favorite animals are dogs.

Cluster 3.name: Educated Mountain Enthusiasts
Cluster 3.description: This cluster includes individuals with higher education who prefer spending time in the mountains. Most of them are men aged 35–44, and their favorite animals are cats.

Cluster 4.name: Mountain and Diverse Animal Lovers
Cluster 4.description: This cluster includes individuals with higher education who prefer spending time in the mountains. Most of them are men aged 25–34, and their favorite animals are dogs and cats.

Cluster 5.name: Women by the Water
Cluster 5.description: This cluster includes individuals with higher education who prefer spending time by the water. Most of them are women aged 45–54, and their favorite animals are dogs.

Cluster 6.name: Forest and Diverse Animal Lovers
Cluster 6.description: This cluster includes individuals with higher education who prefer spending time in the forest. Most of them are men aged 45–54, and their favorite animals include various animals.

Cluster 7.name: Educated Water and Cat Enthusiasts
Cluster 7.description: This cluster includes individuals with higher education who prefer spending time by the water. Most of them are men aged 35–44, and their favorite animals are cats.
